title: Amazing Boutique in the Center of Everything Roman
text:
We loved the Albergo!! Imagine a 6 story grand hotel overlooking the best preserved temple from Antiquity on a beautiful Piazza in the heart of Rome's most historic district, with a great breakfast included - this and more is the wonderful Albergo del Senato. We splurged for the junior suite on the 6th floor and got a corner room with a wonderful terrace off our bedroom - with table and chairs - and one of the world's most amazing views: Face to Face with the Pantheon and the delightful Piazza della Rotonda. We had a small bedroom and adjoining sitting room plus that cozy terrace just outside our bedroom. Even in November sitting outside on the terrace with a nice glass of wine soaking in the Pantheon and the sights and sounds of the Piazza was worth every penny. And the Albergo is very fairly priced - breakfast included. The people were great and the location is the best. Walk out the door and through mostly pedestrian zones to almost every great attraction in Rome. While some have mentioned the "noise" to us it was beautiful: great music coming from terrific musicians (one at a time!) ranging from classical ensembles to acoustic guitar (one of the most moving versions of Leonard Cohen's "Hallelujah." The music always stopped before 10pm and never started until around noon. Its hard for me to imagine a better place to stay in Rome. Get there as soon as you can!
